thong.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a long thin piece of leather used to fasten something or as part of a whip
thong.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a type of shoe that covers the bottom of your foot, with a strap that goes between your toes to hold it on your foot as you walk
thong.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a piece of underwear or the bottom half of a bikini that has a single string instead of the back part
